com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.record
Class Record

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.record.Record

public class Record
extends java.lang.Object

Generic data transport object. A record consists of an arbitrary list of name=value string pairs (represented as Property objects)

Author:
Sander Gates
